name: Aviation accidents and casualties by flight phase (ASN, 2019)
title: Aviation accidents and casualties by flight phase (ASN, 2019)
description: The total number of aviation accidents and fatalities by flight phase (take-off, climbing, en-route, approach and landing). The figures include corporate jet and military transport accidents.

sources.additionalInfo: The total number of aviation accidents and fatalities by flight phase (take-off, climbing, en-route, approach and landing). The figures include corporate jet and military transport accidents.
